ListItemToggle Class Reference
UI Elements » List
Inheritance diagram for ListItemToggle:

Documentation

The ListItemToggle object is for storing editing a boolean value in the application settings. The value can be changed directly in the list by selecting it.

Definition at line 66 of file ListItem.hpp.

Public Member Functions

virtual Element * event_handler (int event, const DrawingAttr &attr)
 This method will toggle the value of the item and return the parent list.
